question:
You are a code expert. Please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate and professional responses. Be sure to provide executable code whenever possible.
Please help me implement this SVG image using code. This is a vector illustration of a map pin icon featuring the flag of Nepal.

checklist.title: Is the basic map pin SVG structure correctly implemented?
checklist.description: Check if the code properly defines an SVG container with appropriate viewBox and dimensions. The map pin should have a recognizable pin shape with a rounded top and pointed bottom. Deduct 5 points if the basic pin silhouette is incorrect, 3 points if the proportions are distorted, and 2 points if the SVG attributes are incomplete. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the flag of Nepal accurately represented within the pin?
checklist.description: Verify that the Nepal flag's unique non-rectangular shape (double pennant) is correctly implemented with the proper blue border and crimson background. The flag should include the sun and crescent moon symbols. Deduct 5 points if the flag shape is incorrect, 3 points if the symbols are missing or malformed, and 2 points if the colors don't match official specifications (crimson: #DC143C, blue: #003893). The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Are the celestial elements of Nepal's flag correctly implemented?
checklist.description: Examine if the sun (12-pointed) and crescent moon symbols are accurately drawn using SVG path elements or appropriate geometric shapes. The proportions and placement should match official specifications. Deduct 5 points if the symbols are significantly distorted, 3 points for minor inaccuracies in ray count or shape, and 2 points for incorrect positioning. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the integration of the flag within the pin visually appropriate?
checklist.description: Assess if the Nepal flag is properly positioned and scaled within the pin shape, respecting the flag's unique proportions while maintaining visual harmony. Deduct 5 points if the flag appears stretched or distorted, 3 points if it's poorly positioned, and 2 points if the integration lacks visual clarity. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the code robust?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code can handle different display contexts (browser rendering, scaling, etc.) and includes appropriate fallbacks. Check for proper namespacing in SVG to avoid conflicts. Deduct 5 points if the SVG doesn't scale properly, 3 points if there's no fallback for older browsers, and 2 points if the code lacks comments for complex paths. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Are there any innovative features that are eye-catching?
checklist.description: Check whether the code includes surprise features that enhance the experience (e.g., 1. Hover/click animations 2. Responsive design adaptations 3. Gradient effects or shadows for depth). Add 3 points for each practical innovative feature implemented (maximum 10 points).

checklist.title: Are there any redundant features?
checklist.description: Strictly check three types of redundancy: 1. Unnecessary nested group elements 2. Redundant path definitions that could be optimized 3. Excessive filters or effects that impact performance without adding value. Deduct 3 points for each redundancy found, and directly deduct 10 points if the core visual elements are obscured by redundant code.

checklist.title: Does the code have engineering quality?
checklist.description: Review code organization (such as using groups for logical sections), path optimization (minimized path commands), and SVG attribute best practices. Deduct 5 points if IDs/classes aren't used for potential CSS/JS manipulation; deduct 5 points if paths aren't optimized; deduct 5 points if the SVG isn't properly structured for accessibility. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the interface vision meet professional design standards?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the overall design follows modern design principles: 1) Accurate color reproduction of Nepal's flag 2) Clean lines with appropriate stroke widths 3) Professional proportions that maintain integrity at different sizes. Deduct 3 points for jagged edges or poor anti-aliasing, 5 points for inaccurate colors, and 5 points for disproportionate elements. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the SVG optimized for performance and compatibility?
checklist.description: Judge whether the SVG is optimized for web use: 1) Minimal path points without losing quality 2) Appropriate use of transforms over redundant path definitions 3) Compatibility with major browsers. Deduct 5 points for bloated paths with unnecessary points, 3 points for lack of minification capabilities, and 5 points for techniques that aren't widely supported. The full score is 10 points.
